#summary Brief description of special documentation tags.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation,Development

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

=Introduction=

*Modeldoc* is an experimental way of adding documentation for a modelling language within the actual implementation itself. This will be discussed later in more detail. The essential tags are:

|| *Tag* || *Description* || *Parser* ||
|| {{{@operational}}} || Operational semantics || [http://code.google.com/p/iaml/source/browse/trunk/org.openiaml.docs/src/org/openiaml/docs/generation/semantics/HandleOperationalTag.java HandleOperationalTag.java] ||
|| {{{@inference}}} || Inference semantics || [http://code.google.com/p/iaml/source/browse/trunk/org.openiaml.docs/src/org/openiaml/docs/generation/semantics/HandleInferenceTag.java HandleInferenceTag.java] ||
|| {{{@implementation}}} || Implementation notes || [http://code.google.com/p/iaml/source/browse/trunk/org.openiaml.docs/src/org/openiaml/docs/generation/semantics/HandleImplementationTag.java HandleImplementationTag.java] ||
|| {{{@example}}} || Examples || [http://code.google.com/p/iaml/source/browse/trunk/org.openiaml.docs/src/org/openiaml/docs/generation/semantics/HandleExampleTag.java HandleExampleTag.java] ||

You can see the most recently-generated model documentation at [http://openiaml.org/model/].
